Do you want to know everything about the Campina Grande Motofest? - I found an excellente app for Android: Get the app for free at
" The Campina Grande Motofest had its beginning in 2006, with only small fairs was happening in Dam old. At the time, the founder Entrepreneur of the event, the motorcyclist Álvaro Lucena fought and with a lot of guts and determination, consolidated event in the city now in its second edition. Every year the entrepreneur climbed to transform the Campina Grande Motofest in a great event for the city, bringing motorcyclists tourists from around the world that drives the local economy creating jobs and formal and informal income.
"Today Campina Grande Motofest is included in the calendar of events of Campina Grande and Paraíba, it became an official event of great importance for the city. The party has shops stand, food court, chemical toilets, stage for concerts , forró foot mountain, police and ambulance.
The Mega Northeast International Event
